raytracer.lights
Class Light

java.lang.Object
  raytracer.lights.Light

public abstract class Light
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class for all types of light sources.

Author:
(c) 2009-11 Roland Fraedrich

Field Summary
protected  double intensity
          Intensity of a light source in the range [0, 1].
 
Constructor Summary
Light(double lightIntensity)
          Constructor for a light source with a given intensity.
 
Method Summary
abstract  java.awt.Color illuminate(Intersection i, Scenery s)
          Illuminates an intersection point by the light source.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Field Detail

intensity

protected double intensity
Intensity of a light source in the range [0, 1]. For the sake of simplicity, we do not model intensity fall-off with increasing distance to the light source.

Constructor Detail

Light

public Light(double lightIntensity)
Constructor for a light source with a given intensity.

Method Detail

illuminate

public abstract java.awt.Color illuminate(Intersection i,
                                          Scenery s)
Illuminates an intersection point by the light source.

Parameters:
i - Intersection point to illuminate.
s - Scenery to test if the light source is shadowed.
Returns:
Color as the result of illumination. Black, if light source is shadowed.
